name: A Celebrity Fashion Dress Up, Makeover, and Make-up Salon Touch Games for Kids Girls
name_original: A Celebrity Fashion Dress Up, Makeover, and Make-up Salon Touch Games for Kids Girls
description:
Do you ever dream about being a Celebrity, Princess, Prom Queen or Bride??? If so, you will love this fun and exciting make-over game.

Have fun giving all the characters make-up and apparel make-overs. Tons of different accessories to choose from. THOUSANDS OF COMBINATIONS!!! Save your favorite styles and even email them to your friends.

How good is your style sense? Will you be the next Prom Queen???
